metadata.title: CVE-2017-15185 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: plugins/ogg.c in Libmp3splt 0.9.2 calls the libvorbis vorbis_block_clearfunction with uninitialized data upon detection of invalid input, whichallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash)via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libmp3splt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
